mapper.select: SELECT pe.payment_event_no AS 'paymentEventNo', pe.member_no AS 'memberNo', pe.order_id AS 'orderId', pe.payment_key AS 'paymentKey', pe.order_name AS 'orderName', pe.method AS 'method', pe.type AS 'type', pe.approved_at AS 'approvedDateTime', pe.is_payment_done AS 'isPaymentDone', po.payment_order_no AS 'paymentOrderNo', po.product_no AS 'productNo', po.seller_no AS 'sellerNo', po.amount AS 'amount', po.payment_order_status AS 'status' FROM payment_msa_v2_order.payment_events AS pe INNER JOIN payment_msa_v2_order.payment_orders AS po ON pe.payment_event_no = po.payment_event_no WHERE pe.member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY pe.payment_event_no DESC, pe.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT pe.payment_event_no AS 'paymentEventNo', pe.member_no AS 'memberNo', pe.order_id AS 'orderId', pe.payment_key AS 'paymentKey', pe.order_name AS 'orderName', pe.method AS 'method', pe.type AS 'type', pe.approved_at AS 'approvedDateTime', pe.is_payment_done AS 'isPaymentDone', po.payment_order_no AS 'paymentOrderNo', po.product_no AS 'productNo', po.seller_no AS 'sellerNo', po.amount AS 'amount', po.payment_order_status AS 'status' FROM payment_msa_v2_order.payment_events AS pe INNER JOIN payment_msa_v2_order.payment_orders AS po ON pe.payment_event_no = po.payment_event_no WHERE pe.member_no = #{memberNo} AND ((pe.created_at = #{createdDateTime} AND pe.payment_event_no < #{paymentEventNo}) OR (pe.created_at < #{createdDateTime})) ORDER BY pe.payment_event_no DESC, pe.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
